mapper.update: update `order` o set o.status = #{status} where o.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalOrders, IFNULL(SUM(IF(status in (2, 3, 4), final_total_price, 0)),0) AS totalRevenue FROM `order` WHERE delete_time IS NULL AND status >= 2

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m') AS `month`, COUNT(*) AS orderCount, IFNULL(SUM(IF(status in (2, 3, 4), final_total_price, 0)),0) AS orderRevenue FROM `order` WHERE delete_time IS NULL AND status >= 2 GROUP BY month ORDER BY month DESC LIMIT #{monthLimit}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS `date`, COUNT(*) AS orderCount, IFNULL(SUM(IF(status in (2, 3, 4), final_total_price, 0)),0) AS orderRevenue FROM `order` WHERE delete_time IS NULL AND status >= 2 GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #{dayLimit}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS todayOrders, IFNULL(SUM(IF(status in (2, 3, 4), final_total_price, 0)),0) AS todayRevenue FROM `order` WHERE delete_time IS NULL AND status >= 2 AND DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()
